sourceMeaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>scooter</radical> that is a <radical>satellite</radical>, but it is <kanji>far off</kanji> and <kanji>far away</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Look up into the sky. That little moving light is the scooter satellite. It's just scooting along, far away from here.
readingMnemonic: The scooter satellite is <kanji>far off</kanji>, but you can still hear it's horn go "<reading>har</reading> (<ja>はる</ja>) har har."
readingInfo: The scooter satellite's only purpose is to make a "har har har" sound that is audible from far away. It's quite obnoxious.
